advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
YouNow is the best way to broadcast live and get an audience to watch you. Chat, meet new people and broadcast to start growing your fan base!

With YouNow you can:

BROADCAST: Tap the “Go Live” button to start your broadcast. Gain new Facebook, Twitter and YouTube followers all while meeting and making new friends.

DISCOVER: Browse through tons of live broadcasts happening right now! Whether you’re into watching musicians perform, or you want to watch your favorite YouTubers/Viners broadcast, there’s something for everyone!

INTERACT: Watch, chat and share live broadcasts with friends and followers.

STAY NOTIFIED: Follow your favorite broadcasters by becoming their fan. You’ll be notified each time they go live.

STAY CONNECTED: Keep in contact with your friends and fans when they aren’t live with profile pages.  
Stay posted on all things YouNow by following us on:
Twitter: @YouNow
Facebook: facebook.com/younow
Tumblr: blog.younow.com

We would love to hear your opinion!
Have questions, problems, or feedback? Reach out to us at feedback@younow.com  

Notice: iPhone 4 users may experience performance issues.
trackCensoredName: YouNow: Broadcast, Chat and Watch Live Video
trackName: YouNow: Broadcast, Chat and Watch Live Video
